basics.name: Arnaud Caldow
basics.label: Senior Data Engineer
basics.summary: Senior Data Engineer with experience designing and scaling cloud-based data platforms across AWS, GCP, and Azure. Skilled in data pipeline orchestration, ETL development, and data lakehouse/warehouse solutions. Adept at mentoring engineers, leading tool migrations, and setting platform-wide standards while maintaining a high-level architectural vision to align technology with business needs.

work.name: Collibra
highlights: **Data Platform Design and Migration:** Led the design and implementation of a new data platform to replace the no-code stack, guiding analysts in transitioning to dbt and adopting best practices.
**Strategic Roadmap and Stakeholder Management:** Co-developed a long-term roadmap for the Data Engineering team, aligning projects with company goals while respecting stakeholder priorities.
**Hiring and Team Expansion:** Conducted technical interviews and skill assessments resulting in the hire of new data engineers.

**LLM-Powered Data Assistant:** Led the development and deployment of a Streamlit web application integrated with a large language model, enabling business users to query and explore company data conversationally.

work.name: Collibra
highlights: **Data Quality Integration:** Developed an Airflow provider for Collibra Data Quality, enabling seamless integration of quality checks into ETL processes and improving data accuracy.
**Process Automation:** Automated requirement-gathering processes, reducing response time by 40% and enhancing user support efficiency.

work.name: Collibra
highlights: **Pipeline Modernization:** Led the migration of 50+ data pipelines to a new orchestration tool, enhancing processing speed and reliability.
**Data Lake and Data Mesh:** Brought in new data sources and standardized best practices, improving data accessibility and pipeline consistency.
**Technical Leadership:** Mentored junior engineers and conducted workshops to advance team expertise in data engineering best practices.

work.name: Lucy In The Cloud (Micropole)
highlights: **ETL and Data Lakehouse Development:** Designed ETL solutions for a data lakehouse, empowering analysts with accessible, self-service data.
**Serverless Solutions:** Implemented serverless ETL workflows and pub/sub messaging, automating high-volume data processing.
**Automation and DevOps:** Built Jenkins pipelines for automated ETL deployments on AWS, ensuring reliable, scalable data integration.
